info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 7:42PM MST until August 06 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MST FOR SOUTHWESTERN COCHISE COUNTY... At 742 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Tombstone, or 14 miles southeast of Benson, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sierra Vista, Whetstone, Huachuca City, St. David, Tombstone, Kartchner Caverns State Park, Fort Huachuca, Fairbank and Charleston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
